revised_title: A Chemical Study of Phosphoric Acid and Potash Contents in Wheat Soils of Broadbalk Rothamsted
tldr: This study investigates the phosphoric acid and potash contents of wheat soils in Broadbalk Rothamsted field, examining the effects of various manurial and cropping conditions on the availability of these nutrients for plant growth. The research provides insights into the relationship between soil composition and crop yields, with implications for agricultural practices.
